channel.title: Still unanswered
channel.description:
I also want to know how to make a command called ::switch with this you can switch from anceint to normal and from normal to anceints.
how do i change it so when you die you will be revived in a certain place?
How do i make a pk zone i got the pk box but i aint got the pk zone i have looked in the tut section but that say how to make a funkpk i tryed it but it didn't work i only want to the pk box so u can kill anyone at any lvl for e.g lvl 3 vs lvl 126 and when you go out of wildy your not in wildy.
I also need to fix this
